casebody.data:
Henry Messenger, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. John Messenger, Respondent v. Same Defendants, Appellants. Decided February 13, 1891. Appeal by defendants' *577from judgment entered upon findings and decision of a judge on a trial at special term by the court without a jury. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. James B. Ludlow, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgments affirmed, with costs.
